FuncDef: The display dhcpv6-server group command displays information about DHCPv6 server groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the DHCPv6 server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display dhcpv6-server group command displays information about DHCPv6 server groups, including the group status and IP addresses of the master and backup DHCPv6 servers.
Configuration Impact
If a DHCPv6 server group is specified, information about the specified DHCPv6 server group is displayed. Otherwise, information about all DHCPv6 server groups is displayed.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
